alert.note: Alert for Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 10:11PM CDT until June 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Smith County in north central Kansas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1011 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gaylord, or 25 miles east of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gaylord around 1020 PM CDT. Harlan around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Smith Center. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
